extension.description: This is a ScreenSaver that makes use of multiple image when prompted to start the screensaver. Remember to turn on [B]Adult Check[/B] to prevent showing any installed adult addons.
extension.disclaimer: By using this, you take reponsibility for anything that happens. I take no responsibility for any problems this plugin might in any way, form, shape or size cause. This is project is for a LEARNING EXPERIANCE.
